content.content: Hi MakerDAO community! We are Odos (odos.xyz), a new dex aggregator LIVE on Polygon (more chains to be announced soon). We are the first and only dex aggregator that offers a multi-asset input feature, enabling users to swap from several tokens into one asset in a single atomic transaction, saving time, gas and limiting market volatility for users. Check us out and swap to/from $DAI and $amDAI !!!  Screen Shot 2022-07-10 at 1.06.58 PM1910×1246 87.3 KB  We’d love to connect with MakerDAO Growth Core Unit team to discuss an upcoming campaign initiative and feature release collaboration. Thank you, Team Odos @odosprotocol
content.GPT-summary: The post is an advertisement for a new dex aggregator called Odos, which is live on Polygon and offers a multi-asset input feature. The author is also seeking to collaborate with the MakerDAO Growth Core Unit team for an upcoming campaign initiative and feature release.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal
